Text: Send Back To School gifts that get an Amake a Personal Connection FLOWERSCOM College Students Survival Basket College Students Survival Basket Dear LARRY Its about that time again Students of all ages are about to put their thinking caps on and head back into the classroom and now you can send them off in style with a gift from our Back To School CollectionIt has something for every student whether they are entering the high pressure academia of coloring inside the lines or are off to college and need a gift basket full of brain food to get through those allnighters Dont forget your favorite teachers our collection has great gifts for them tooWere celebrating years of helping people make gift connections and whether you visit us online stop by one of our retail stores or just call our name you can rely on us for all of your gifting needs hours a day days a week days a year Heres to another yearsFrom your friends at FLOWERSCOM Visit us online at flowerscom or atAOL Keyword flowersPS Grandparents Day is right around the corner Sunday September Watch your email for gift ideas to show them just how grand they areOffer valid through You are subscribed as Exclusive Back to School Popcorn Tin Bite Size Cookie Basket Snoopy Lunch Box with Chewy Caramels Books and Blooms Juniper Bonsai Back to SchoolPopcorn Tin Bite SizeCookie Basket Snoopy Lunch Boxwith Chewy Caramels Books and BloomsTMJuniper Bonsai Personalized Greetings Gift Certificates Member Benefits Gift Finder Remove Me Contact Us Security Privacy Disclaimer Store Locator IMAGEIMAGE

Get a FREE personalized card at FLOWERSCOMIMAGEDear LARRYPick a card any card and make a personal connection As your trusted guide to giftingsm we strive to provide you with gift su ggestions for every occasion and we are pleased to announce a new online p roduct offering printed greeting cards and postcards Register at FLOWERSCOM Greetings by October and receive a FREE card You c an create personalize and send these customprinted cards for any occasio n including birthdays anniversaries baby announcements and invitati ons Simply select a design from over images or create your own in cluding photo uploads write your personal message add or upload recipien t address lists for as many cards as you need and well take care of the r est Your cards will be beautifully printed on heavy card stock and mailed fir stclass the next business day Its the perfect compliment to any gif t To find out more visit the greetings section of wwwflowerscom W e all know its the thought that counts but if you want to enhance your se ntimental expression send them a gift from our under collection It has great gifts that perfectly fit any budget From your friends at FLOWERSCOM Visit us online at wwwflowerscom or at AOL Keyword flowers Of fer available on online card orders only through This email was sent to IMAGEIMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE Birthdays Anniversaries Announcements Invitations A ll Occasions Personalized Greetings Gift Certificates Member Benefit s Gift Finder Remove Me Contact Us Security Privacy Disclaimer St ore Locator IMAGE

Get your Halloween gifts early at FLOWERSCOMRVisit our spooktacular Halloween collection FLOWERSCOM Frights and FlowersTM Frights and FlowersTM Dear Valued Customer Get into the Halloween spirit Now you can get an early jump on Halloween and find the perfect gifts for all your favorite goblins witches and ghouls in our spooktacular Halloween Collection It has sweet treats plush playmates gifts to decorate the home and of coursefrightfully fresh flowers Witch ever you choose you are sure to make Halloween a hit From your friends at FLOWERSCOM Visit us online at wwwflowerscom or at AOL Keyword flowers Offer valid through This email was sent to Halloween Popcorn Tin Halloween Brownie Treats Tin Lenox Halloween Cat Mum Plant in Wooden Bucket HalloweenPopcorn Tin Halloween BrownieTreats Tin Lenox Halloween Cat Mum Plant inWooden Bucket Personalized Greetings Gift Certificates Member Benefits Gift Finder Remove Me Contact Us Security Privacy Disclaimer Store Locator IMAGEIMAGE

Save on Grandparents Day giftsmake a Personal Connection FLOWERSCOM Spray Roses with Grandmother Book Spray Roses with Grandmother Book Dear LARRY A grand occasion is almost here Grandparents Day is Sunday September th and its the perfect time to thank Nana and PopPop for sneaking that dollar into your pocket when you werent looking Our Grandparents Day Collection has gifts for every sentiment from delicious gourmet goodies to the finest collectibles and of course the freshest flowers With a few quick clicks you can thank Grandma and Grandpa for all of their love and support with the perfect gift You can now receive off Simply enter promotion code GP at checkout Its never been easier to show them theyre grand From your friends at FLOWERSCOM Visit us online at flowerscom or at AOL Keyword flowers Offer expires You are subscribed as Mille de Fleur Arrangement Frame with Julep Cup Set Chrysanthemums with Grandparents Photo Album Mary Engelbreit Teacup for Her Mille de Fleur Arrangement Frame withJulep Cup Set Chrysanthemums withGrandparents Photo Album Mary Engelbreit Teacup for Her Personalized Greetings Gift Certificates Member Benefits Gift Finder Remove Me Contact Us Security Privacy Disclaimer Store Locator IMAGEIMAGE

LARRY here is a Electronic Gift Certificate for youYour trusted guide to gifting FLOWERSCOMIMAGEDear LARRY This year we are celebrating years of helping people make special connections As a valued customer we would like to take this opportunity to thank you for helping us grow into your trusted guide to gifting sm and to invite you to join us in the celebration with your own Electronic Gift Certificate good towards online and phone purchases Over the last years weve built our business on the principles of delivering the finest products and services available Whether you click on wwwflowerscom visit a FLOWERSCOM retail store or just call our name we are here hours a day days a week to help you find a gift for any occasion Your Electronic Gift Certificate number is PPR To redeem your Electronic Gift Certificate simply enter the digit number exactly as it appears in this email in the Gift Certificate Number space provided on our checkout page When entering the number please be aware that the dashes must be included and the number is case sensitive Thank you for letting us celebrate your special moments with you for years and heres to another IMAGE Jim McCann CEO FLOWERSCOM Visit us online at flowerscom or at AOL Keyword flowers Offer valid through You are subscribed as IMAGE Personalized Greetings Gift Certificates Member Benefits Gift Finder Remove Me Contact Us Security Privacy Disclaimer Store Locator IMAGE
